channel.title: CVE Feed for Badger Meter -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Badger Meter -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-1302|2024-08-12T14:51:12.959Z -- badger%20meter -- monitool
item.description: Information exposure vulnerability in Badger Meter Monitool affecting versions up to 4.6.3 and earlier. A local attacker could change the application's file parameter to a log file obtaining all sensitive information such as database credentials.

item.title: CVE-2024-1301|2024-08-12T14:48:20.912Z -- badger%20meter -- monitool
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in Badger Meter Monitool affecting versions 4.6.3 and earlier. A remote attacker could send a specially crafted SQL query to the server via the j_username parameter and retrieve the information stored in the database.

item.title: CVE-2024-1304|2024-08-01T18:33:25.477Z -- badger%20meter -- monitool
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Badger Meter Monitool that affects versions up to 4.6.3 and earlier. This vulnerability allows a remote attacker to send a specially crafted javascript payload to an authenticated user and partially hijack their browser session.

item.title: CVE-2024-1303|2024-08-01T18:33:25.568Z -- badger%20meter -- monitool
item.description: Incorrectly limiting the path to a restricted directory vulnerability in Badger Meter Monitool that affects versions up to 4.6.3 and earlier. This vulnerability allows an authenticated attacker to retrieve any file from the device using the download-file functionality.

item.title: CVE-2024-1301|2024-08-01T18:33:25.485Z -- badger%20meter -- monitool
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability in Badger Meter Monitool affecting versions 4.6.3 and earlier. A remote attacker could send a specially crafted SQL query to the server via the j_username parameter and retrieve the information stored in the database.

item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Badger Meter Monitool that affects versions up to 4.6.3 and earlier. This vulnerability allows a remote attacker to send a specially crafted javascript payload to an authenticated user and partially hijack their browser session.
